params._amount: Amount the offer was for/and is being accepted.
params._buyer: Address of the user who submitted the collection offer.
params._currencyAddress: Address of the currency used for the offer.
params._originContract: Contract of the asset the offer was made on.
params._splitAddrs: Addresses to split the sellers commission with.
params._splitRatios: The ratio for the split corresponding to each of the addresses being split with.

params._amount: Amount the piece if being bought for (excluding marketplace fee).
params._currencyAddress: Currency address of asset being used to buy.
params._originContract: Contract address for asset being bought.

params._buyer: The user who placed the collection offer.
params._originContract: The nft contract the collection offer was made on.

returns._0: CollectionOffer struct containing the currencyAddress, amount, and marketplace fee.

params._originContract: The nft contract the collection sales price was set on.
params._seller: The user who set the collection sales price.

returns._0: CollectionSalePrice struct containing the currencyAddress, amount, token range, and split information.

params._currencyAddress: Address of the token being offered.
params._originContract: Address of the collection the offer is placed on.

params._amount: Amount of the currency the asset is being listed for (including all decimal points).
params._currencyAddress: Contract address of the currency the collection is being listed for.
params._originContract: Contract address of the collection being listed.
params._splitAddrs: Addresses to split the sellers commission with.
params._splitRatios: The ratio for the split corresponding to each of the addresses being split with.

acceptCollectionOffer(address,address,ui.notice: Accept a collection offer that as made.

buyFromCollection(address,uint256,addres.notice: Purchase token under the current owners collection sale price.

cancelCollectionOffer(address).notice: Cancels an existing collection offer the sender has placed.

cancelCollectionSalePrice(address).notice: Cancels an existing collection sale price set by the sender.

getCollectionOffer(address,address).notice: Queries the collection offer made on {_originContract} by {_buyer}.

getCollectionSalePrice(address,address).notice: Queries the collection sales price set on {_originContract} by {_seller}.

makeCollectionOffer(address,address,uint.notice: Place an offer for a collection that can be accepted by any token owner.

setCollectionSalePrice(address,address,u.notice: Set a sale price for all pieces under {_originContract}.

documentation.text: @notice Emitted when the a collection offer is placed via {makeCollectionOffer}.
@notice Emitted when a collection offer is cancelled via {cancelCollectionOffer}.
@notice Emitted when a collection sale price is set via {setCollectionSalePrice}.
@notice Emitted when a collection sale price has been cancelled via {cancelCollectionSalePrice}.
@notice Emitted when a token is bought from a sale price via {buyFromCollection}.
@notice Emitted when a collection offer is accepted via {acceptCollectionOffer}.
@notice Emitted when an offer or sale price with an amount of 0 is made via {makeCollectionOffer} and {setCollectionSalePrice}.
@notice Emitted when a sale price has an invalid token range.
@notice Emitted via {acceptCollectionOffer} if no offer exists on {_originContract} for {_buyer}.
@notice Emitted via {buyFromCollection} if no sale price exists for {_originContract} and {_seller}.
@notice Emitted via {buyFromCollection} if the token is not in the sale price range.
@notice Emitted via {acceptCollectionOffer} and {buyFromCollection} when the required amount isnt sent.
@notice Emitted via {buyFromCollection} and {acceptCollectionOffer} when the currency address doesnt match the sale price/offer.
@notice Emitted via functions if the contract has been paused.

@notice Cancels an existing collection offer the sender has placed.
 @param _originContract Contract address of collection.

@notice Cancels an existing collection sale price set by the sender.
 @param _originContract Contract address of the collection.
